Class LifeSequence

java.lang.Object
  LifeSequence
public class LifeSequence
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to have an instance for each sequence to put into the phylogenetic tree.

Author:
Gabriel Chandesris

getSeqType

public static boolean getSeqType(java.lang.String seqtest)
Determine if sequence is Nucleic Acids sequence (i.e. ADN, but not ARN because of unpresent uracil) or a Amino-Acids sequence (i.e. a protein).

Parameters:
seqtest -
Returns:
false if Nucleic ; true if Proteic
